attributes.additional_details: The Scots have there Assembly as do the Welsh we alone do not have our own.  The M P's of Scotland and Wales have the right to vote on all matters affecting England one needs to ask why.  All things English should be the sole issue for English MP's with no outside interference.  This is the case for both Scotland and Wales whereby our MP's in England cannot vote on any matters pertaining to those two countries.  England for the English!!
